author: calderona
body:
#### PR description:

There were some missing piece in the muon monitor client for the muon DQM that crashed at the online DQM. Now it has been fixed, and it is expected to be included on next MWGR.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28488
title: [DQM] Updated the client for MuonMonitor in online DQM
